text: Claude Castonguay, (May 8, 1929 â€“ December 12, 2020) was Canadian Progressive Conservative politician, educator and businessman. He was born in Quebec City, Quebec. He was a member of the National Assembly of Quebec from 1970 to 1973. Catonguay was a member of the Senate of Canada from 1990 to 1992. Castonguay died on December 12, 2020 at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Quebec
title: Claude Castonguay
